'''ThinkLight'''''(n)''''':''' A bright white LED above the screen of recent ThinkPads designed to illuminate the keyboard.  It is toggled on and off by pressing Fn+PgUp.

----

Since it is BIOS controlled, it will work on every Ubuntu flavour right out-of-the-box.
For more information see <nowiki>[[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/ThinkLight|ThinkWiki]]</nowiki>.
